content: Afternoon's perfect for hunting, yeah. What do I hunt?{短暂停} Hmm... how about you start running?

I love being outdoors,
I love the flowing wind, the drifting clouds,
And all my precious little ones sunbathing on the grass.

content: Never thought I'd see the day where someone's chasin' me around chattin' to me...

content:

Does that mean I missed all three of my morning meals?
Now, which yummy meal should I make up for first...

content:
"When injustice shows its face, time for a bhan~
When the moment's right, throw down and slam!"
Never heard these lyrics before? Well, now you have.

content:
Have we run into each other many times today,
Or am I just lost?

content: We meet yet again! You're like those lively little ores, always bouncing around, and bumping into me!

content:
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, good morning!
I woke up to the smell of meat cooking...
I wonder who's making such a delicious stew so early in the morning...

content:
The night is lovely, I enjoy taking walks at this hour.
The glowing stones make them easy to spot at this time.
<size=30>Though I don't see any nearby.</size>

content:
Am I lost again?
No, wait—we've just run into each other again.
You know what, bhan? I'm actually pretty happy to see you!
